title: List Creatives Request
description: Request parameters for querying creative assets from the centralized library with filtering, sorting, and pagination

filters.title: Creative Filters
filters.description: Filter criteria for querying creative assets from the centralized library. By default, archived creatives are excluded from results. To include archived creatives, explicitly filter by status='archived' or include 'archived' in the statuses array.

formats.description: Filter by creative format types (e.g., video, audio, display)

enumDescriptions.processing: Creative is being processed or transcoded
enumDescriptions.approved: Creative has been approved and is ready for delivery
enumDescriptions.rejected: Creative has been rejected due to policy or technical issues
enumDescriptions.archived: Creative has been archived and is excluded from default queries

tags.description: Filter by creative tags (all tags must match)

tags_any.description: Filter by creative tags (any tag must match)

name_contains.description: Filter by creative names containing this text (case-insensitive)

created_after.description: Filter creatives created after this date (ISO 8601)

created_before.description: Filter creatives created before this date (ISO 8601)

updated_after.description: Filter creatives last updated after this date (ISO 8601)

updated_before.description: Filter creatives last updated before this date (ISO 8601)

assigned_to_packages.description: Filter creatives assigned to any of these packages

media_buy_ids.description: Filter creatives assigned to any of these media buys

buyer_refs.description: Filter creatives assigned to media buys with any of these buyer references

unassigned.description: Filter for unassigned creatives when true, assigned creatives when false

has_performance_data.description: Filter creatives that have performance data when true

limit.description: Maximum number of creatives to return

include_assignments.description: Include package assignment information in response

include_performance.description: Include aggregated performance metrics in response

include_sub_assets.description: Include sub-assets (for carousel/native formats) in response

fields.description: Specific fields to include in response (omit for all fields)

context.title: Context Object
context.description: Opaque correlation data that is echoed unchanged in responses. Used for internal tracking, UI session IDs, trace IDs, and other caller-specific identifiers that don't affect protocol behavior. Context data is never parsed by AdCP agents - it's simply preserved and returned.

ext.title: Extension Object
ext.description: Extension object for platform-specific, vendor-namespaced parameters. Extensions are always optional and must be namespaced under a vendor/platform key (e.g., ext.gam, ext.roku). Used for custom capabilities, partner-specific configuration, and features being proposed for standardization.

examples.description: Search for Nike creatives with performance data

_bundled.note: This is a bundled schema with all $ref resolved inline. For the modular version with references, use the parent directory.
